Text:

any chance of finding The Tombs By Clive Cussler

and Paris in Love by Eloisa James.

THANKS!!!

@BBS

As always, thank you very much for the wonderful selection of books.
Thanks, BBS! I go through these book floods only when I need some fiction books, though. Do they happen to contain some non-fiction as well?
Thankyou bigbluesea, THREE floods at once? Must be early Xmas?
I feel so illiterate. :(

Thank you very much for these floods!

Zadie Smith - NW
Thanks bigbluesea!

Thank you so much or these downloads.  I'm sure you know how much everyone appreciates them.  I have some more requests.
Can you get these Elizabeth Berg books?
    What We Keep, The Year of Pleasures, Say When, Never Change & Range of Motion
Also:
Bernhard Schlink - Homecoming
Ann Brashares - The Last Summer (Of You & Me)
Ann Hood - The Knitting Circle:  A Novel
Tracy Chevalier - Falling Angels
Jodi Picoult - Picture Perfect & Mercy
Ursula Hegi - Salt Dancers
Julia Glass - The Widower's Tale

Thanks again in advance!!

@wheatie02 

I have 10 of the books you want,I will upload in next flood :)

Great stuff!!!

Appreciate it, BBS!!!

Any chance of some books by C J Cherryh (Foreigner, Alliance-Union series, e.g.) or by Lois McMaster Bujold (e.g., Vorkosigan saga)? Have been thrilled to find so many of my faves among your book floods. Very much appreciated.

BBS.
Thank you once again for some great books.Truly appreciate all the effort you do to make reading so enjoyable for everyone! 
Looking for:  Under The Hawthorn Tree by Ai Mi,  & Blackberry Winter & The Bungalow both by Sarah Jio.
Thank You!

Thank you so much...appreciate all the effort & time you put in to give everyone some great books.

Blackberry Winter & The Bungalow  both by Sarah Jio.

@nix19

I do have 29 books titled "Dark Hunter 1-29" by "Sherrilyn Kenyon" I don't know if they are correct,the list I found seem to conflict with one another in terms of titles.I will upload all of them hopefully they are correct

Great uploads, but then again, they always are. It is much appreciated! I would like to request any and all that you might have of Jane Feather and Cynthia Eden. Oh, and the latest J D Robb which come out on 9/11. Thanks for all of the hard work you do to bring this material to us.

I repeat my thanks for your valueable work,  I take it you cant fine Douglas Kennedy, hes the only one i cant seem to find anywhere.
Any way thanks a bunch. I was wondering do you have gynob or general practice books. Thanks again BBS , great work.
